name: Buffalo Chicken Mason Jar Salads
author: B. Tario
summary: Excellent use for leftover chicken! This salad adds the pop of the Buffalo sauce with the cool creamy ranch, blue cheese crumbles, and the crunch of the celery and carrot. It's your favorite wing night in a salad, so there's less guilt ... right?
ingredients: 2 tablespoons Buffalo-style hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's® RedHot)
15 ounces cooked chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces
directions: Combine ranch dressing and hot sauce in a small bowl
Divide dressing equally between 5 wide-mouthed, quart-sized glass canning jars, forming the first layer
Add equal amounts of celery and carrots, forming the next 2 layers
Place 3 ounces of chicken in each jar
Top chicken with 2 cups of salad greens in each jar
Place 1/4 cup blue cheese on top of salad greens
Seal and refrigerate jars until ready to use
Divide croutons evenly into 5 small lidded containers
When ready to eat, dump jar contents and croutons into a bowl and toss
